channel.title: I need help with this errror(not a ordinary error for this type)
channel.description:
it happens when i click on my cannon to kill npcs it,i can get the cannon to kill players with my attackPlayersWithin void
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 at client.attackNPCSWithin(client.java:5963) at client.objectClick(client.java:3267) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19093) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16223) at client.process(client.java:16193) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Server [fatal] - exception
[note] please dont say look at those spots and fix it i tried that and it still doesnt work
